resources.string: This app allows you to check out different shoes available and maybe even create your own shoes listing! Go to the shoe list via the following button and enjoy!
Here is how to use our app:

The shoe listing page will show the list of shoes and show a button for adding a new shoe, while the detail page will be for adding a shoe entry. All entries will be saved only as long as the app is running. Any shoe entry must have a name, size, company, description, and images.
